text: Epafras, ana vhɨra won raar vhuun nde ndɨɨi. Ana nden kɨvntok ma, ana vhɨra Krais Zisasan ŋaara guma ma. Ana vhɨra zazera khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap nde nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai, ana nden kurkurarim, nde khaŋ tɨgɨ havhargip mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi farar muuŋgip, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvi kaŋgip, guigira za ana vuzvugi kaŋgirga.
